name: Dungeons & Treasure VR
description: Dungeons & Treasure is a roguelike multiplayer created with voxel art for virtual reality. The game is an endless fast-paced action adventure. You progress through different environments with unique enemies, bosses and challenges like traps and minor puzzles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 1 GB available space
